title: WHY YOU SHOULD VOTE FOR DEEP SPACE ILLAOI
body:
We all know that, in her regular lore, {{champion:420}} is a faithful priestess of Nagakabouros that wholeheartedly embodies and preaches the teachings of her religion. Deep Space Illaoi completely turns that theme on its head, giving it a new horrifying spin: the priestess that once spread her truth through faith has now become a knowledge-seeking space explorer who was contaminated by a Dead Space-like alien creature and is now being mind-controlled by it in order to spread the infection.
On top of that, we already have a space skin, Astro{{champion:111}}, that could be beautifully incorporated in the new lore: "unwilling to abandon his fellow astronaut Illaoi, who fell to the infection, Nautilus keeps fighting against the space parasyte in order to find a cure" (which would be an ironic parallel to Nautilus' regular lore, where he got corrupted by a dark entity and left for dead by his own crew).
